column1: A Celebration of Life service will be held on Saturday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at First Baptist Church in Clearbrook
column4: MN with Reverend Verlyn Strenge officiating. A visitation will be one hour prior at the church. Interment will be at Maple Hill Cemetery in Clearbrook
column5: MN. The Cease Family Funeral Home of Bagley assisted the family with arrangements.
